oracle.cloud.storage.model
Class Container

java.lang.Object
  oracle.cloud.storage.model.Container

public final class Container
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a handle to a Container in a Service Instance of the Oracle Storage Cloud Service. Containers hold storage objects.

Author:
Copyright (c) 2013, Oracle and/or its affiliates. All rights reserved.

getMetadataValue

public java.lang.String getMetadataValue(java.lang.String metadataKey)
Get the meta data value of a given key. They key names are normalized and hence this is a preferred method for looking up keys.

Parameters:
metadataKey - - the key to lookup
Returns:
- the value associated with the key.
